description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 5/03/2006

Marone Board Members have a meeting with Massimo and Nick.  The agree that Nick should be appointed the new CEO of Marone Industries as they have received a memo from Megan with all the information about Massimo and Megan working together to frame Jackie. Nick accepts the postion and an upset Massimo walks out.  Ridge tells Stephanie he feels Brooke should still be with him despite everything. Brooke reveals to Bridget that Nick and her slept together.
